article:
Angel Falls, New York Timers Bestseller, written by Kristin Hannah, tells the following story. To save his wife's life, an ordinary man must risk losing   _   forever. 
  Living   in a small town of Washington State, Liam and Michaela have a perfect marriage and family. While Liam enjoys being a doctor, Michaela   attends to   their children. 
One day Michaela falls off a horse. hits her head and   _   into a coma . Liam has been told not to expect a recovery.   Still  , he doesn't give it up. He hopes that love can   _   what medical science can not. To   _   her out, Liam sits at her   bed side   and speaks to her. He talks about their life together. He tries various ways to   _   her. He brings her favorite music and place across her unmoving body with her favorite sweaters that smell like   home  . Meanwhile Liam tries his best to keep life as   _   as possible for their kids. One day,   _   through Michaela's closet to find a dress, he happens to find some souvenirs  of her first marriage and a picture of her former husband --Julian True. The discovery makes him   _   the foundations of their marriage, Michaela has a secret past and had a marriage before. Liam has known the fact   _   he was not the love of her life, but she is the love of his.   Even if   still in a coma, Michaela responds violently to the stories between Julian and her. Risking losing his wife forever, Liam decides to find Julian to save her. 
With Julian's help, Michaela   _   awakens. But she has to make a hard choice between the two men. In the end of the story she   _   to Liam for not telling him her past and says goodbye to Julian. She has discovered that it's Liam who stays with her through years of decorating the Christmas tree, who   _   what love really is. 
Angel Falls is named as the best   _   of the year by "Publishers Weekly"in the US. Kristin Hannah's books have   _   many awards.
